parameters.name: BillOwnerId
parameters.description: The ID of the member. If you specify a value for this parameter, you can query the bills of the specified member. If you leave this parameter empty, the bills of the current account are queried by default.

parameters.name: BillingCycle
parameters.description: The billing cycle, in the YYYY-MM format.

parameters.name: SubscriptionType
parameters.description:
The billing method. Valid values:

*   Subscription: the subscription billing method
*   PayAsYouGo: the pay-as-you-go billing method
